mapper.insert: insert into student (student_id, student_account, student_name, student_password, student_phone, student_sex, student_coin, student_email, is_delete, student_createtime, student_deletetime, student_img ) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{studentCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{studentDeletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{studentImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update student set student_account = #{studentAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_password = #{studentPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_phone = #{studentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_sex = #{studentSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_coin = #{studentCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_email = #{studentEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, student_createtime = #{studentCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, student_deletetime = #{studentDeletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, student_img = #{studentImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
